channel.title: Kings guard got me killed :(
channel.description: I was the mastermind we were doing all fine and dandy when our assaisn attacks a drunk.... the drunk debuached me and it said you were attacked but you are immune... I was confused cause I didn't attack him. And it was because the kings guards. Is there any way to give hint it was something different?

item.title: Kings guard got me killed :(
item.dc:creator: Aquillion
item.description:
What Hippolytus said. You were just extremely unlucky; but the change you’re suggesting would mostly buff BD (since you’d be giving more information to people who are attacked, who are usually BD.)

Read full topic

item.title: Kings guard got me killed :(
item.dc:creator: Shrimpy
item.description:
I don’t understand. EDIT: Now I do lol

Read full topic

item.title: Kings guard got me killed :(
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
The worst part when the king figured out the mistake

Read full topic

item.title: Kings guard got me killed :(
item.dc:creator: Hippolytus
item.description:
In general giving less ability-specific info is a buff to Scum. If the drunk had debuached any other player you would have got a free mis-lynch. You were just unlucky I am afraid .

Read full topic

item.title: Kings guard got me killed :(
item.dc:creator: Firekitten
item.description:
I was the mastermind we were doing all fine and dandy when our assaisn attacks a drunk… the drunk debuached me and it said you were attacked but you are immune… I was confused cause I didn’t attack him. And it was because the kings guards. Is there any way to give hint it was something different?
